item.description:
For those of you who aren't aware of this event, it is one of the biggest fundraisers that the league does every year to benefit the shelter and the care of all its animals.

I think it would be great if we could get a large group of our members and their dogs together to walk for a good cause!

THIS IS A RAIN OR SHINE EVENT, so please dress for the weather!

The Pet Step activities commence at 9:30am and go until 2:30pm. The walk begins at 11am.

The fee is $10 per person (not dog) to enter the festivities, or you can make pledges to raise more money with our team on the walk. To download the pledge sheet, click on this link: http://www.rescueleag...
Please register your pledges under the name "Human Soles and Doggie Paws"

It is a leash-mandatory event, but there are LOTS of dogs and their owners, vendors, food, activities, etc. It is a rain or shine event, and is held in New Boston. To read last year's press release, visit:
http://www.rescueleag...

I think we could be a HUGE asset to the league at this event! Let's try to get a BIG group to come together and help these animals receive the care they need while waiting for their forever homes!

Also, below you will find the basic Event Schedule for this day:

Walk registration 9:30-11am

Canine Good Citizen Testing 10-11am & 1-2pm (for further information email Wendy at wendytrox@yahoo.com)

Kids Corner Games & Activities ALL DAY!

Fun for Dogs ALL DAY!

Microchipping ALL DAY!

Pet Psychics ALL DAY!

Walk Begins 11am

Silent Auction closes 1pm

Event end time 2:30pm

There will be numerous pet related vendors at this event, so make sure to bring your wallets!

If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact me, Kerri Morrison, through meetup.

Hope to see you there!

P.S. I will likely try to print name tags with our team name on it for the team members to stick together during the event. Look for these name tags at the registration table. However, I believe the league will be printing buttons for our team.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our group's name on name tags. We will meet 15 mins prior to the walk at the starting area.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Walk as a team at the ARLNH-Bedford 7th Annual Pet Step
